revised_title: Sandwich Damping Treatment for Noise Reduction in Industrial Concrete Structures
tldr: The article discusses the application of sandwich damping treatment to concrete structures in industrial environments to reduce noise and vibration. The technique involves using a bitumen-rubber latex mixture as a damping material, which adheres readily to concrete surfaces and provides effective damping for vibrations. The effectiveness of this technique is demonstrated through the damping of the foundations for a railway in the City of London.
